content: Economic Blues got you down? Never fear, Uncle Sam to the rescue. All of you that "lost" so much money in your "retirement account" this site may help you. News Article Link: "http://www.drudgereport.com/flashns.htm" Your tax money at work. Economic Blues Recovery Site (.gov mods) Please seek help before it's to late. This has been a Public Service Announcement

title: Government to offer an online emotional rescue kit

content: Possible Warning Signs Of Post Economic Emotional Syndrome (PEES) "Persistent Sadness/Crying Excessive Anxiety Lack of Sleep/Constant Fatigue Excessive Irritability/Anger Increased drinking Illicit drug use, including misuse of medications Difficulty paying attention or staying focused Apathy - not caring about things that are usually important to you Not being able to function as well at work, school or home "
